name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 15574 Fraser Hwy, Surrey, BC V3S 2V8

featured_reviews.review_id: Was the worst experience we have had at a mc Donald's. They let the homeless smoke crack outside and sit inside all day. A guy was doing coke and banging on the walls in the bathroom. The staff were informed more then 7 times and manager did nothing. My husbands life was threatened and was the only reason the cops were called. I'm super displeased with the management. They need to teach their staff and mangers proper procedures. There was little kids running around watching this as well. My ten year old son couldn't even use to bathroom and we had to take him home as he was so terrified. They need to hire a security team if they are scared to deal with problems themselves.

featured_reviews.review_id: Ordered on Uber Eats and the muffin wasn't even packed, they just shoved it in the bag with everything else. Also ordered some ketchup packets but they added none. I ordered one apple and one strawberry pie but they gave me two strawberry pie. Also, the pies were cold since they were only fresh until 8:56 which was almost 4 hours ago. Not ordering from this location again.

featured_reviews.review_id: Ordered 2 jrs 1 double cheeseburger and a large fries with bbq sauce, sweet and sour sauce and mchicken sauce. Got charged for all of the sauces even mchicken and when I get home to eat I have no sweet and sour sauce but instead 2 packs of hot mustard ?? As if it's an substitute and my "large fries" were not even filled till half..Atleast give me what I paid for.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I generally have had generally good experience with this McDonalds ordering mostly through the drive thru. I decided to do curbside pick up as I was really tired and hungry tonight after being up for 16 hours and working for 12 hours, so I wanted something quick before heading home.

I ordered 2 burgers and parked at curbside pick up spot # 3 at 859pm and ordered and checked in via the app in the same minute. It was very busy as it was a Saturday night so I patiently sat and waited for my food.

By 925pm, my food still hasn't arrived and I was hangry, so I went inside to follow up. I was told that "as you can see the order is ready but there was no one in the spot" and the person I was talking to themselves "checked to find no car parked in spot # 3," to which I said that I have been there the entire time patiently waiting for almost half an hour staring at that number 3.

The person then proceeds to throw away the order bag in the trash and says "we'll do [the order] again" without waiting for my response, which further irritated me because it means I have to wait for longer. I honestly would have taken the food to prevent food waste and I was now starving. I felt like I was dismissed and ignored as the person didn't even acknowledge my side and the fact that I waited that long for 2 burgers.

I waited another 10 minutes for the order to be made and I was on the phone when the order came and there were no apologies whatsover when the order was handed to me and I left the parking lot at 937pm.

Massively disappointed. Considering choosing another McDonalds to go to regularly now or just make my own burger from scratch if it means waiting 37 minutes for it to be ready.

featured_reviews.review_id: Food was good once we got it. Waited 5 minutes at the counter just to place an order. I counted 4 people running around for the drive thru orders. Not a single one looks over in order to avoid eye contact and coming to serve the counter. I don't do the kiosk or online ordering thing. After I placed my order and paid is when the real waiting started. Almost 15 minutes for my order. Finally got my food after I counted about 8 cars order and go thru the drive theu window. Obviously this store does not place any kind of priority on the inside restaurant orders. All the resources are used for the drive thru. Even the Indian lady who I would say was a manager as she had a sweater and different shirt on was helping in drive thru. Lots of the tables were dirty when we went to sit down with my kids. The only reason I come to this location is for the play center. I will probably be avoiding this mcdonalds as the service is non existent and the men's restroom was filthy and the door didn't even have a lock. Looks like it hasn't been cleaned in days. I suggest you print a log for your restrooms and check them hourly. This is an embarrassment to any food place. I've gone in to cleaner restrooms in a 3rd world country.

featured_reviews.review_id: Chaotic, messy and unkind service. Huge line up - took 10 minutes to get a tea and muffin. Staff were even annoyed at us asking what flavour the muffins were - but that's because they didn't have  signs so we had to ask as we had an allergy. After prompting the staff again for my order (people ordering after us got their order first) I finally get my drink and muffin and my tea is a coffee. The restaurant was dirty and there were so many people waiting for their orders. Coukd also tell drive through was a mess as the customer there was waiting for her drinks (they made them wrong too). I'd give them a 0 if I could.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Ordered a mcdouble with extra ketchup, triple pickles.
Got a burger with meat so over cooked, cold and dry I am almost certain it was from yesterday.

It had tons of mustard and no ketchup and 4 pickles.

Every time I give mcdonalds a try again, its something like this.

Just go out of business already if you dont care about your customers anymore. Save us from hoping you will one day serve a product worthy of the ridiculous price you charge.

featured_reviews.review_id: I asked for fresh fries and they were cold, the bathrooms were filthy and staff were talking really loud about having P.M.S!! No wonder it was so bad. Even after telling them about the bathroom, they did nothing.
